title: What Will Ben Simmons' Reception Be? Lakers' Expectations
description:
Brian Windhorst, Dave McMenamin and Ramona Shelburne discuss Ben Simmons returning to the 76ers, what the reception will be like for him in Philadelphia, how the Lakers are preparing for the season and what their expectations should be.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
